/* com.innobiz.orange.web.pt.dao.PtAuthGrpBDao.selectPtAuthGrpB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'AUTH_GRP_CAT_CD' AND CD = M.AUTH_GRP_CAT_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AUTH_GRP_CAT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = M.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.COMP_ID, T.AUTH_GRP_ID, T.AUTH_GRP_TYP_CD, T.AUTH_GRP_CAT_CD, T.AUTH_GRP_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.AUTH_GRP_DESC, T.SYS_AUTH_GRP_YN, T.USE_YN, T.SORT_ORDR, T.REGR_UID, DATE_FORMAT(T.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, DATE_FORMAT(T.MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'AUTH_GRP_CAT_CD' AND CD = T.AUTH_GRP_CAT_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AUTH_GRP_CAT_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = T.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM PT_AUTH_GRP_B T
AND T.COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.AUTH_GRP_ID = #{authGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.AUTH_GRP_TYP_CD = #{authGrpTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.AUTH_GRP_CAT_CD = #{authGrpCatCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.COMP_ID, T.AUTH_GRP_ID
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
